    main

Function reference

Sample Shiny apps based on the Teal framework

A package to run and extract the source code of a suite of teal sample apps

get_app_code()
Get the source code of an app
launch_app()
Run an app from the gallery
list_apps()
List the teal apps in the gallery

Deployment of Shiny apps

Helper functions to deploy Shiny apps to Posit Connect or shinyapps.io

deploy_app()
Deploy an app from the gallery to any Posit Connect server
deploy_all_apps()
Wrapper to deploy all teal sample apps at once

On this page

teal.gallery is a part of the NEST and pharmaverse.
